# celltype

The goal of celltype is to use a dictionary of cell types to identify the identity of each cell in single cell RNA-seq data 

## Installation

You can install the development version of celltype from [Github](https://github.com/ddiez/celltype) with:

``` r
remotes::install_github("ddiez/celltype")
```
